Download the national metadata file for more information.
indicator_name: Mortality rate attributed to unsafe water, unsafe sanitation and lack of hygiene (exposure to unsafe Water, Sanitation and Hygiene for All (WASH) services)
indicator_definition: Deaths per 100,000 population attributed to intestinal infectious disease(A00, A01-A08, A09), intestinal nematode infection(B76-B77), and malnutrition(E40-E46)
computation_calculations: Compiling data from death reports filed with city, district, and municipal offices, baby and fetal death reports from crematories, and data from the ｢Complementary Survey on Causes of Death｣ of medical institutions
